Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Jo A. Schreiber-lyon
Reviews.Content: Great Camera.. I purchased the Fuji for my Dad (87yr old) who's not the best at being stable.  The ease of use and having buttons large enough for him to use plus (A MAJOR PLUS) is the stability feature.  No more fuzzy shots from his shaking.  He is very happy with his new camera and the clear photos it produces.

ProductInfo.Features:
Resolution 12.2 Megapixel   Digital Zoom 5.7 x  Zoom lens - 5.7 mm - 17.1 mm - f/2.9-5.2
Built-in flash
Shooting Programs Landscape, portrait mode, night mode, text, party/indoor, fireworks, panorama assist, flower, sports mode, sunset, beach, night (tripod), natural light, snow, baby, anti-blur
Light Sensitivity ISO 100, ISO 800, ISO 400, ISO 200, ISO 1600, ISO auto
Video Capture AVI - 320 x 240 - 30 fps ¦ AVI - 640 x 480 - 30 fps
ProductInfo.Name: FUJIFILM FinePix AX230 12MP 5X Zoom HD Movie mode Digital Camera - Red
